body.p: An entity determines the discount rate and other financial assumptions in nominal (stated) terms, unless estimates in real (inflation‑adjusted) terms are more reliable, for example, in a hyperinflationary economy (see IAS 29 Financial Reporting in Hyperinflationary Economies), or where the benefit is index‑linked and there is a deep market in index‑linked bonds of the same currency and term.
